# Image Assets

This directory contains all the image assets for the Nova Hotel Supplies application.

## Required Images

### Product Images
- `sandalwood-shampoo-1.jpg` - Sandalwood shampoo main image
- `sandalwood-shampoo-2.jpg` - Sandalwood shampoo secondary image
- `sandalwood-gel-1.jpg` - Sandalwood shower gel main image
- `sandalwood-gel-2.jpg` - Sandalwood shower gel secondary image
- `sandalwood-conditioner-1.jpg` - Sandalwood conditioner main image
- `sandalwood-conditioner-2.jpg` - Sandalwood conditioner secondary image
- `towel-set-1.jpg` - Luxury bath towel set main image
- `towel-set-2.jpg` - Luxury bath towel set secondary image

### Category Images
- `category-toiletries.jpg` - Toiletries category image
- `category-bathroom.jpg` - Bathroom category image
- `category-bedroom.jpg` - Bedroom category image
- `category-dining.jpg` - Dining category image

### Homepage Images
- `hero-image.jpg` - Main hero section image
- `about-hero.jpg` - About page hero image

## Image Specifications

- **Product Images**: 400x400px minimum, optimized for web
- **Category Images**: 300x200px, landscape orientation
- **Hero Images**: 1200x600px, landscape orientation
- **Format**: JPG or PNG
- **Quality**: Optimized for web (compressed but high quality)

## Placeholder Images

For development purposes, you can use placeholder images from services like:
- https://via.placeholder.com/400x400
- https://picsum.photos/400/400
- https://unsplash.com/

## Usage in Components

Images are referenced in the components using relative paths:
```typescript
images: ['assets/images/product-image.jpg']
```

Make sure to add the actual image files to this directory for the application to work properly.
